Jesus Christ!!!!  This sounds soooooooo cooooooooool!!!!!!  That is a link =
between RPGs!!!!!!!  Wicked, I'm in!!!
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  Fr=
om: David Torrey 
  To: nbmrpg@egroups.com ; nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Fr=
iday, August 18, 2000 4:18 AM
  Subject: The first message for Neo Beast Ma=
chines!!


  ::Unicron::

      "Here we are, at the beginning of a new sag=
a. The Transformers are in for much more than they have seen. I will be ret=
urning, at some point, once I have enough power. But until then I will use =
some of my power to alter the planet. Then Magmatron will own some of the p=
lanet, the parts I need."
      Cybertron glowed a bright crimson red. The =
Citadel of Elders now becomes Magmatrons layer. Some new characters will be=
 appearing under Magmatron's rule.
      Unicron traveled back in time. He =
reached Past Earth. He was in the Neo Beast Wars near future. He placed a T=
ime Gate on the planet in a remote location. He then traveled a few days ba=
ck.
      He found Magmatron trying to move his base closer to the ocean.
 =
     "That's right, he needs salt water to survive. Well, that's no problem=
," He said to himself. He talked to Magmatron.
      "My minion, the time h=
as come for you to leave this planet behind, you have greater goals. I will=
 allow you time to decide who will lead the Destron forces in your place."
=
      "It is decided, master," Magmatron called up. "Shredder will lead the=
 Destrons here on Earth."
      "Very well, I will transport you to Cybertr=
on."
      With that Magmatron was gone from Past Earth. The Gateway would =
be discovered in a few days and more Transformers may travel through it. (L=
eaving it as a story connector)
